docstring.long_description: It takes one dataframe type data and selects 3 different columns to generate the OrderedTriple type.
docstring.short_description: Convert a DataFrame DataContainer to an OrderedTriple DataContainer.

parameters.name: default
parameters.description: The input dataframe to which we apply the conversion to.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The index of the column that represents the x-axis.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The index of the column that represents the y-axis.

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: The index of the column that represents the z-axis.

returns.description: The OrderedTriple result from the conversion of the input.
